metadata.name: RainbowPiggy
metadata.description:
此卡用以纪念 WePiggy 跨链部署计划的第六步：登陆 Optimism。神奇的小猪在彩虹角的保护下，穿越 DeFi 的黑暗森林。持有此卡可获得由 WePiggy 加持的“乐观小猪，二层突进”状态。
This card is issued to commemorate the Sixth step of WePiggy's cross-chain deployment plan: Optimism. 
A magical piggy traverses the dark forest of DeFi under the protection of the rainbow horn. Holder of this NFT will be blessed by WePiggy with the buff of "Optimistic Piggy, L2 Go Straight Ahead".
总量(Amount)：198 
品级(Level)：史诗(Epic)
